Adrenaline Surge.name: Adrenaline Surge
Adrenaline Surge.description: You can draw upon exceptional reserves of physical strength to meet challenges imposed on your body.

adrenalineSurge.name: Adrenaline Surge
adrenalineSurge.description: You expend Heroism and benefit from +2 Boons to any action which scales using Strength for 3 Rounds. You may perform this action outside of your turn in Combat before making a Reaction.

Alchemical Resolve.name: Alchemical Resolve
Alchemical Resolve.description: You rapidly apply alchemical vapours which instill your ally with supplemental bravery in the face of horror.

alchemicalResolve.name: Alchemical Resolve
alchemicalResolve.description: You rapidly bolster the Morale of an ally within 4 feet by applying vapours. Perform a Medicine check against the target's Madness Threshold. Successful checks restore Morale.

Alchemy Journeyman.name: Alchemy Journeyman
Alchemy Journeyman.description:
You have a professional degree of experience with the alchemical sciences and can work through some of the more advanced alchemical processes given sufficient time.

The basic properties of most common ingredients are easy for you to remember without reference material, but you still need books for rarer recipes and ingredients.

Alchemy Novice.name: Alchemy Novice
Alchemy Novice.description:
You have received training in the fundamentals of Alchemy and are capable of working with most common concoctions and decoctions.

You still need to reference recipes and books to identify alchemical ingredients and their properties.

Anticipate Harm.name: Anticipate Harm
Anticipate Harm.description: Your keen reflexes and acuity allow you to anticipate imminent danger and react to avoid it.

anticipateHarm.name: Anticipate Harm
anticipateHarm.description: You may immediately move 4 feet after the area-of-effect of the attack is declared. If this movement escapes the area of the attack, you are unaffected.
anticipateHarm.condition: You are targeted by an area-of-effect attack, the source of which you can see.

Arcana Adept.name: Arcana Adept
Arcana Adept.description: You gain the Adept rank in the Arcana skill, providing a +2 Skill Bonus.

Arcana Journeyman.name: Arcana Journeyman
Arcana Journeyman.description: You gain the Journeyman rank in the Arcana skill, providing a +1 Skill Bonus.

Arcana Master.name: Arcana Master
Arcana Master.description: You gain the Master rank in the Arcana skill, providing a +3 Skill Bonus.

Arcana Novice.name: Arcana Novice
Arcana Novice.description:
Your education covered the fundamentals of metaphysics and magical theory, the relationship between the runes, the opposing nature of order and chaos, and a cursory introduction to spiritual beings including the most commonly known deified and demonized figures of worship. You gain the Novice rank in the Arcana skill and are no longer considered Untrained in that skill.

Your rudimentary understanding of the principle grammar of magic is sufficient to identify which lesser rune a spell or ritual may be using, as well as the gesture used (if not the inflection). You can identify whether a figure is influenced more by chaos or by order, and can spot the signs of common spirits (both lesser and greater). You know enough about religious customs to communicate with those who worship a particular spirit or deity without embarrassing yourself.

Arcane Archer.name: Arcane Archer
Arcane Archer.description:
Your skill with archery can shape your spellcraft, partially substituting for the somatic gestures of traditional spellcasting.

While using a Projectile weapon as your mainhand weapon, you ignore the free-hand requirement for casting spells using the Arrow gesture and the range of those spells becomes your weapon range.

Immediately after performing a Strike with a projectile weapon, you may cast a spell with its Action cost reduced by 1.

Armored Efficiency.name: Armored Efficiency
Armored Efficiency.description: You are trained in wearing the heaviest types of armor while still retaining mobility. You are able to use a free Movement action once per Turn while wearing Heavy armor.

Armored Shell.name: Armored Shell
Armored Shell.description:
You are expert in using your armor in combination with your shield to create a defensive shell.

When you have the Guarded condition and have a Heavy Shield equipped, your base Armor defense is reduced by half but your Block defense increases by a corresponding amount.

Artful Parry.name: Artful Parry
Artful Parry.description: You anticipate dodging an attack, intercepting it to intentionally Parry the strike.

artfulParry.name: Artful Parry
artfulParry.description: When you defend against a melee attack using the Dodge defense, you can react and expend Focus to instead Parry the attack.
artfulParry.condition: You Dodge an incoming melee Strike.

Assassin.name: Assassin
Assassin.description:
You specialize in bringing death the the unwary. Any Strike or Spell attack against an Unaware target becomes Deadly.

An Unaware creature hit by your attack may not alert its allies until its own turn in Combat.

markForDeath.name: Mark For Death
markForDeath.description: You spend 1 minute studying a creature. Perform a Knowledge Test about your target. If successful, you learn all damage types against which the target is Vulnerable. Your minimum Initiative during the first round of Combat becomes one greater than the Initiative of your marked target.

Assess Strength.name: Assess Strength
Assess Strength.description:
You take a moment to observe a creature which you can see and develop intuition about its areas of strength.

Perform a Knowledge Test using a Skill chosen by the Gamemaster. On a success, you learn which Defense type of Physical, Fortutude, Willpower, or Reflex is highest for the creature. On a Critical Success you learn the two highest defense types.

assessStrength.name: Assess Strength
assessStrength.description: You observe a creature you can see to assess it's notable areas of strength.

Athletics Adept.name: Athletics Adept
Athletics Adept.description: You gain the Adept rank in the Athletics skill, providing a +2 Skill Bonus.

Athletics Journeyman.name: Athletics Journeyman
Athletics Journeyman.description: You gain the Journeyman rank in the Athletics skill, providing a +1 Skill Bonus.

Athletics Master.name: Athletics Master
Athletics Master.description: You gain the Master rank in the Athletics skill, providing a +3 Skill Bonus.

Athletics Novice.name: Athletics Novice
Athletics Novice.description:
You have received training in basic athletics. You gain the Novice rank in the Athletics skill and are no longer considered Untrained in that skill.

You know whether a surface can support your weight or not, how to find handholds while climbing, and how to distribute your weight for buoyancy when swimming. You know how to run for distance, and how to pace yourself to avoid exhaustion.

Awareness Adept.name: Awareness Adept
Awareness Adept.description: You gain the Adept rank in the Awareness skill, providing a +2 Skill Bonus.

Awareness Journeyman.name: Awareness Journeyman
Awareness Journeyman.description: You gain the Journeyman rank in the Awareness skill, providing a +1 Skill Bonus.

Awareness Master.name: Awareness Master
Awareness Master.description: You gain the Master rank in the Awareness skill, providing a +3 Skill Bonus.

Awareness Novice.name: Awareness Novice
Awareness Novice.description:
You have been trained in the basics of situational awareness, and are able to notice important details about your environment. You gain the Novice rank in the Awareness skill and are no longer considered Untrained in that skill.

You know to check for exits when you enter a room, and how to look for concealed weapons, hidden traps, and other threats. You know how to spot when you are being followed, and how to search for common hiding places.

Backstab.name: Backstab
Backstab.description: You focus your cunning instincts on exploiting the weak points of a flanked target. You identify an opportunity and strike with deadly efficiency.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.description: You Strike with your mainhand weapon against a Flanked target, dealing Deadly damage.
backstab.condition: You are attacking a target with the Flanked condition.

Bard.name: Bard
Bard.description:
You practice the oral and musical traditions of heroic storytelling to inspire courage in your allies, demoralize your foes, and be quick with unconventional solutions to problems.

You learn Rune: Soul if you do not already know it. When restoring the morale of allies using the Rune of Spirit you gain +2 Boons to your roll.

laughingMatter.name: Laughing Matter
laughingMatter.description:
When an enemy uses an attack that fails to affect you or any ally, you construct a cutting jest or pantomime which makes a fool of their feeble effort.

You make an Performance skill attack against the target's Fortitude, dealing Psychic damage to Morale upon a success. Furthermore, upon a success, the target suffers 1 Bane to all rolls until the start of their next turn.

The target must be able to see and understand you to be affected by this ability.
laughingMatter.condition: An enemy fails to affect you or any ally with an attack.

Battle Focus.name: Battle Focus
Battle Focus.description: You find focus and calm within the thrill of battle. When you achieve a Critical Hit that deals damage to Health or Morale you gain +1 Focus. This benefit may occur at most once per Round.

Beastmaster.name: Beastmaster
Beastmaster.description: You have trained your animal companion to aid you in combat. Your companion may participate in encounters as an allied combatant.

Berserk Strike.name: Berserk Strike
Berserk Strike.description: You channel your lust for combat into an adrenaline-fueled strike which increases in power as you become more wounded.

berserkStrike.name: Berserk Strike
berserkStrike.description:
You imbue your strike with momentum and intensity, increasing the Damage Bonus of your strike according to your missing Health.

  • If your Health is below 75%, your Strike deals +1 Damage

  • If your Health is below 50%, your Strike deals +2 Damage

  • If your Health is below 25%, your Strike deals +3 Damage

This damage bonus is doubled if you are using a Two-Handed weapon.

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.description: You revel in the thrill of combat, hurling yourself into the fray with reckless abandon.

berserkerRage.name: Berserker Rage
berserkerRage.description: You become Enraged. While Enraged you deal 4 additional damage on all melee attacks. You may attempt to end the effect on your own turn by succeeding on a Willpower test against a DC of 20. The effect ends automatically when Combat is concluded.
berserkerRage.condition: You have suffered damage to your Health pool since your last turn in Combat.

Blood Frenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
Blood Frenzy.description: Your battle lust spurs you to feats of heightened action. When you achieve a Critical Hit that deals damage to Health you immediately gain +1 Action. This benefit may only happen once per Round.

Blood Magic.name: Blood Magic
Blood Magic.description:
You rely upon occult techniques to transform physical pain into arcane potential.

You cast spells by spending Health instead of Focus. When casting a spell each point of Focus costs 10 points of Health instead. Spells you cast cannot restore your own Health.

Bloodletter.name: Bloodletter
Bloodletter.description:
Your precision with weapons which deal Slashing or Piercing damage can cause the Bleeding condition on Critical Hits which deal damage to Health.

The Bleeding effect lasts for 1 round and deals your Dexterity score as additional damage to Health.

Body Block.name: Body Block
Body Block.description: You lean into an attack which was otherwise defended with your Armor, converting its result into a Block instead.

bodyBlock.name: Body Block
bodyBlock.description: An attack which otherwise is defended by your Armor or produced a Glancing blow is converted to a Block and deals no damage.
bodyBlock.condition: You defend against a melee attack with your Armor or as a Glance.

Bull Rush.name: Bull Rush
Bull Rush.description: You can use your physical prowess to push past opponents who block your path.

bullrush.name: Bull Rush
bullrush.description: Make an Athletics skill Attack against an adjacent enemy contested by your target's Fortitude defense. On a success you may move up to your Stride directly through the enemy's space. Your enemy is knocked Prone and may not make any attack of opportunity against you. On a failure your movement is blocked and your remain in your current position.

Bulwark.name: Bulwark
Bulwark.description:
You have expertise in using a Shield to defend yourself and others.

Once per Turn while you have a Shield equipped, you may use the Defend action at a reduced cost of 1 Action Point.

Cadence.name: Cadence
Cadence.description: You are drilled in performing sequences of melee attacks with rhythmic precision. When you Strike multiple times in sequence using a one-handed melee weapon you gain a stacking +1 Boon for each successive attack.

Carefree.name: Carefree
Carefree.description:
You are able to compartmentalize and brush off setbacks, providing a remarkable ability to recover from damage to your Morale.

Your Madness Threshold is reduced by 1, making you easier to heal.

Clarify Intent.name: Clarify Intent
Clarify Intent.description: You use apply your situational awareness and persuasiveness to rapidly communicate a plan of action to an ally.

clarifyIntent.name: Clarify Intent
clarifyIntent.description: You explain your intentions to an ally within 12 feet. Make an Diplomacy skill attack against your ally's Madness Threshold. If successful they gain +1 Focus and +1 Boon to actions made within the next Round.

Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.description: This martial technique is a specialized two-handed fighting maneuver which relies upon brute strength to swing your weapon in a wide arc, hitting multiple enemies in its path.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: A ferocious two-handed swing cleaves through foes in a 120 degree arc.

Combat Medicine.name: Combat Medicine
Combat Medicine.description: Your knowledge and skill in Medicine covers the rapid triage, diagnosis, and treatment of wounds.

combatMedicine.name: Combat Medicine
combatMedicine.description: You rapidly treat the wounds of an ally within 4 feet. Perform a Medicine Check against the target's Wounds Threshold. Your ally's Health is increased by the amount of the Roll in excess of the threshold.

Concussive Blows.name: Concussive Blows
Concussive Blows.description:
Your physical power wielding melee weapons which deal Bludgeoning damage can cause the Staggered condition on Critical Hits which deal damage to Health.

The Staggered effect lasts for 1 round and reduces your target's maximum Action by 1.

Conjurer.name: Conjurer
Conjurer.description: You are a master of Conjuration and the Gesture of Creation to manifest arcane energy as physical form. You can maintain up to 3 such creations simultaneously rather than only one.

Conserve Effort.name: Conserve Effort
Conserve Effort.description: You find calmness and focus in conserving your effort in battle. When you end your Turn with un-spent Action you gain +1 Focus.

Control Proficiency.name: Control Proficiency
Control Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Control. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Motivate action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Cooking Journeyman.name: Cooking Journeyman
Cooking Journeyman.description:
You have a professional degree of experience with the culinary arts and can work through some of the more advanced methods of food preparation given sufficient time.

The basic properties of most common ingredients are easy for you to remember without reference material, but you still need books for rarer recipes and ingredients.

Cooking Novice.name: Cooking Novice
Cooking Novice.description:
You have received training in the fundamentals of Cooking and are capable of producing many common meals using available ingredients.

You still need to reference recipes and books to identify some ingredients and their preparations.

Counter Evade.name: Counter Evade
Counter Evade.description: You are practiced in evasive fighting styles which use an enemy's missed attack to devise an opening to counter-attack.

counterEvade.name: Counter Evade
counterEvade.description: When you defend against a melee attack with a Dodge, you may expend Focus to retaliate with a reduced-cost Strike using your mainhand weapon.
counterEvade.condition: You Dodge an incoming melee Strike.

Counter Riposte.name: Counter Riposte
Counter Riposte.description: You are expert in translating a parried attack into a swift counter against your exposed enemy.

counterRiposte.name: Counter Riposte
counterRiposte.description: When you defend against a melee attack with a Parry, you may react and expend Focus to retaliate with a reduced-cost Strike which benefits from the Exposed condition.
counterRiposte.condition: You Parry an incoming melee Strike.

Counter Strike.name: Counter Strike
Counter Strike.description: You are trained to transition between defending with your shield and a swift counter-attack.

counterStrike.name: Counter Strike
counterStrike.description: When you defend against a melee attack with a Block you may expend Focus to retaliate with a reduced-cost Strike using your mainhand weapon.
counterStrike.condition: You Block an incoming melee Strike.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description:
You immediately react to a spell being cast and compose a rune and gesture designed to unravel and negate the spellcraft of an enemy mage.

Playtest Notes

This action can now be used in playtesting, but it is not yet fully automated. The Counterspell can be performed, but it is up to the Gamemaster to manually reverse a previously applied spell and to manually deduct its Action and Focus cost. These steps of the overall Counterspell workflow will be automated in a subsequent update such that a confirmed Counterspell will also confirm the spell that was countered, but with its effects removed.

counterspell.name: Counterspell
counterspell.description:
You form arcane energy into a countervailing spellcraft, targeting a spellcaster you can see within 30 feet.

Designate a Rune and Gesture which you know to attempt to counter the spell. Choosing a Rune which is opposed to one used in the spell grants +2 Boons to your attempt. Selecting the identical Gesture as the one being cast also adds +2 Boons to your attempt.

Perform a harmless Spell Attack against your target's Willpower defense. If your roll exceeds their defense, the spell is countered and its magic is nullified, producing no effects.
counterspell.condition: Another creature which you can see is casting a spell.

Death Proficiency.name: Death Proficiency
Death Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Death. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Ennervate action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Deception Adept.name: Deception Adept
Deception Adept.description: You gain the Adept rank in the Deception skill, providing a +2 Skill Bonus.

Deception Journeyman.name: Deception Journeyman
Deception Journeyman.description: You gain the Journeyman rank in the Deception skill, providing a +1 Skill Bonus.

Deception Master.name: Deception Master
Deception Master.description: You gain the Master rank in the Deception skill, providing a +3 Skill Bonus.

Deception Novice.name: Deception Novice
Deception Novice.description:
You are a liar and manipulator, and deception is a skill you've practiced. You gain the Novice rank in the Deception skill and are no longer considered Untrained in that skill.

You know how to construct basic lies and cons, and the telltale signs that tend to give away poor liars. You can construct a basic forgery for most common documents, but they won't stand up to any measure of close scrutiny.

Decisive Action.name: Decisive Action
Decisive Action.description: Your sharpened mind thinks quickly amidst the maelstrom of combat, identifying and seizing opportunities that others might miss.

decisiveAction.name: Decisive Action
decisiveAction.description: You expend Heroism to instantly recover half your Intellect in Action. You may perform this action outside of your turn in Combat before making a Reaction.

Defensive Roll.name: Defensive Roll
Defensive Roll.description: You are a nimble skirmisher, always in movement to stay one step ahead of your enemies in combat.

defensiveRoll.name: Defensive Roll
defensiveRoll.description: When you Dodge a melee attack you can expend Focus to leap into a defensive roll, moving up to your Size in any direction.
defensiveRoll.condition: You Dodge an incoming melee Strike.

Dervish.name: Dervish
Dervish.description: You are specialized in fighting with two weapons. In combat you become a whirlwind of weapons, deadly to any foes who approach.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description: You become a cyclone of whirling weaponry, making Strike attacks with both weapons against every enemy within range.

Diplomacy Adept.name: Diplomacy Adept
Diplomacy Adept.description: You gain the Adept rank in the Diplomacy skill, providing a +2 Skill Bonus.

Diplomacy Journeyman.name: Diplomacy Journeyman
Diplomacy Journeyman.description: You gain the Journeyman rank in the Diplomacy skill, providing a +1 Skill Bonus.

Diplomacy Master.name: Diplomacy Master
Diplomacy Master.description: You gain the Master rank in the Diplomacy skill, providing a +3 Skill Bonus.

Diplomacy Novice.name: Diplomacy Novice
Diplomacy Novice.description:
You know the basics of debate and how to use rhetorical devices to make your arguments more convincing. You gain the Novice rank in the Diplomacy skill and are no longer considered Untrained in that skill.

You know how to leverage emotion in your words to inspire others or sway their opinions. You can make a convincing argument, and you can generally steer others to agree with your point of view.

Dirty Tricks.name: Dirty Tricks
Dirty Tricks.description: You have pouches of sand and dust that you use to temporarily distract or blind an enemy.

dirtyTricks.name: Dirty Tricks
dirtyTricks.description: You fling debris into the eyes of an enemy. If the Strike is successful, they are Blinded until the end of their next Turn.

Disarming Strike.name: Disarming Strike
Disarming Strike.description: A martial technique designed to disarm your opponent, forcing them to drop an object held in one of their hands.

disarmingStrike.name: Disarming Strike
disarmingStrike.description: You make a Strike against a the Reflex defense of a single target. The technique is Difficult to perform and deals reduced damage. If successful, the target's mainhand weapon is Dropped.

Distance Runner.name: Distance Runner
Distance Runner.description: You are adept at covering distance quickly. Your Stride increases by 1.

Diversionist.name: Diversionist
Diversionist.description: You specialize in using subterfuge to distract or trick your opponent during combat.

distract.name: Distract
distract.description: You make a Deception based Skill Attack against the Willpower defense of a target within 30 feet which can see or hear you. On a success, the target loses 1 Focus.

Dread Lord.name: Dread Lord
Dread Lord.description: You exude a terrible presence on the battlefield which tests the morale of nearby enemies that behold you, breaking the resolve of the weak-willed.

formidablePresence.name: Formidable Presence
formidablePresence.description: You make an Intimidation skill attack against the Willpower defense of enemies within 12 feet, dealing Void damage to Morale and causing the Frightened condition for 1 Round to those whose defense you overcome.

Dual Wield.name: Dual Wield
Dual Wield.description: You are adept at fighting with two weapons simultaneously. You can weave attacks together to strike more rapidly than possible with a single weapon.

offhandStrike.name: Offhand Strike
offhandStrike.description: Immediately after you perform a basic Strike with your mainhand weapon, you make a reduced-cost fullow-up Strike with your offhand weapon.

Dustbinder.name: Dustbinder
Dustbinder.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Earth. Spells which use this Rune cause the @Condition[corroding] condition on Critical Hits.

The Corroding effect lasts for 3 Rounds and deals your Wisdom score as Acid damage to Health each Round.

Earth Proficiency.name: Earth  Proficiency
Earth Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Earth. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Mould action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Enchanting Journeyman.name: Enchanting Journeyman
Enchanting Journeyman.description:
You have a professional degree of experience with the Enchanting arts and can work through some of the more advanced Enchantment rituals given sufficient time.

The basic properties of most common glyph-infused components are easy for you to remember without reference material, but you still need books for rare ritae and sympathetic materials.

Enchanting Novice.name: Enchanting Novice
Enchanting Novice.description:
You have received training in the fundamentals of Enchantment and are capable of working with most common charms and enchantments.

You still need to reference recipes and books to identify sympathetic materials and their properties.

Evasive Shot.name: Evasive Shot
Evasive Shot.description: You are an expert at firing shots with ranged weaponry while evading enemy attacks. After performing a ranged weapon attack, you gain half your Stride in additional free movement.

Executioner's Strike.name: Executioner's Strike
Executioner's Strike.description: You deliver a single decisive strike against a wounded enemy.

executionersStrike.name: Executioner's Strike
executionersStrike.description: You deliver a Deadly Strike with a two-handed heavy weapon. If your attack is successful, your opponent also suffers the Bleeding condition for 3 Rounds, taking additional damage each Round equal to your Strength score.

Extoll Deeds.name: Extoll Deeds
Extoll Deeds.description: You inspire courage within your allies by extolling the heroic deeds of a companion. You may react by composing a verse, making a quip, or shouting a battle cry when an ally you can see Incapacitates or achieves a Critical Hit against an enemy creature. The celebration of these heroic deeds restores the Morale of your allies within 6 spaces.

extollDeeds.name: Extoll Deeds
extollDeeds.description: You compose a verse, make a quip, or shout a battle cry to extoll the heroic deeds of one of your allies. All allies near to you regain Morale equal to half your Presence score.
extollDeeds.condition: An ally whom you can see slays or scores a critical hit against an enemy.

Eye of the Storm.name: Eye of the Storm
Eye of the Storm.description:
After you Delay your Turn, gain +2 Boons on any Strike or Spell attack against an enemy that you allowed to act before you that Round.

TODO: Needs automation. For now apply boons manually.

Fan of Arrows.name: Fan of Arrows
Fan of Arrows.description: This difficult ranged weaponry technique allows you to fire a multiple shots with your weapon in a sweeping cone, each targeting a different enemy in the area of effect.

fanOfArrows.name: Fan of Arrows
fanOfArrows.description: You fire multiple projectiles from your ranged weapon in an arc, striking all enemy targets within a 40 foot cone.

Feinting Strike.name: Feinting Strike
Feinting Strike.description: A two-weapon technique which makes a feint with your primary weapon, exposing your target for an off-hand attack.

feintingStrike.name: Feinting Strike
feintingStrike.description:
You feint with your mainhand weapon, making a Deception attack against the target's Reflex defense. You immediately make a Strike with your offhand weapon.

If your Deception was successful, you gain +2 Boons to your Strike and it deals an additional +6 Damage.

Ferocious Leap.name: Ferocious Leap
Ferocious Leap.description: You leap powerfully into battle to deliver a punishing blow to a nearby enemy with your mainhand weapon.

ferociousLeap.name: Ferocious Leap
ferociousLeap.description: You leap up to 10 feet and perform a Strike against an enemy within melee range of where you land. Your movement ignores difficult terrain and is not blocked by enemy creatures.

Flame Proficiency.name: Flame Proficiency
Flame Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Flame. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Enkindle action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Flaming Arrow.name: Flaming Arrow
Flaming Arrow.description: You take time to light and loose an arrow covered in flammable pitch. This shot takes longer but is very damaging to either creatures or structures.

flamingArrow.name: Flaming Arrow
flamingArrow.description: You loose a Empowered ranged strike using a Projectile weapon which deals Fire damage upon impact.

Flash of Steel.name: Flash of Steel
Flash of Steel.description: You are an expert in using a thrown weapon to imbalance or expose your target for follow-up strikes.

flashOfSteel.name: Flash of Steel
flashOfSteel.description: You make a Thrown weapon attack, targeting a weak point in your enemy's defences. If the attack hits, the target becomes Exposed until the start of their next Turn.

Fletching Journeyman.name: Fletching Journeyman
Fletching Journeyman.description:
You have a professional degree of experience with the skill of Fletching and can work with some of the more advanced bowcraft techniques given time.

The basic properties of most common Fletchery components are easy for you to remember without reference material, but you still need books to handle rarer schematics and components properly.

Fletching Novice.name: Fletching Novice
Fletching Novice.description:
You have received training in the fundamentals of Fletchery and are capable of working with most common types of bow and their ammunition.

You still need to reference schematics and books to identify useful materials and their properties.

Flurry.name: Flurry
Flurry.description: A martial technique using two weapons to overwhelm a single target with a relentless sequence of attacks.

flurry.name: Flurry
flurry.description: You Strike twice with each weapon, but each strike is Difficult.

Flying Kick.name: Flying Kick
Flying Kick.description: An unarmed technique where you launch yourself while running at an enemy in a leaping kick which is empowered to deal additional damage.

flyingKick.name: Flying Kick
flyingKick.description: Move forward between 3 feet and 6 feet in a straight line to kick an enemy with an empowered Strike.

Focused Anticipation.name: Focused Anticipation
Focused Anticipation.description: Anticipation leads to decisive action. When you have the highest Initiative score for a Round of combat, you gain +1 Focus.

Frost Proficiency.name: Frost Proficiency
Frost Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Frost. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Condense action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Fulcrum.name: Fulcrum
Fulcrum.description: Balance, positioning, and leverage are your greatest allies in combat. You know how to use a foe's momentum against them and that a small redirection in force can turn the tide of battle.

conserveMomentum.name: Conserve Momentum
conserveMomentum.description: You redirect the force of a melee attack which misses you, pivoting it to instead hit some other adjacent enemy. Your attacker must re-roll their attack targetting their ally instead.
conserveMomentum.condition: You Block, Parry, or Dodge an incoming melee Strike.

Gesture: Arrow.name: Gesture: Arrow
Gesture: Arrow.description:
You hurl a projectile imbued with the magical power of a Rune at a distant target.

The Arrow gesture scales using Intellect and targets a single creature up to a distance of 60 feet, dealing 8 Base Damage to targets which fail to Resist the spell. This gesture requires 1 Hand to cast and has a base cost of 3 Action and 1 Focus.

Gesture: Aspect.name: Gesture: Aspect
Gesture: Aspect.description:
You infuse the essence of a Rune into your body, empowering your own physical form or psyche.

When you assume a certain Aspect, you become more closely attuned to the damage type of the Rune used in your spell. You gain +2 Resistance to that damage type, and deal an additional +2 Damage whenever dealing damage of that type.

Your Aspect lasts for 6 Rounds. You may only have one active Aspect, casting another spell using the Aspect gesture replaces the previous effect. This gesture requires 1 Hand to cast and has a base cost of 2 Action and 1 Focus.

Gesture: Aura.name: Gesture: Aura
Gesture: Aura.description:
You concentrate the arcane power of a Rune to create a maintained field of energy that washes over allies and enemies near to you.

The Aura gesture scales with Presence and produces an emanation with 20 feet radius centered on the spellcaster. The center of this Aura moves with the spellcaster.

Depending on the Rune used, the Aura deals damage or provides healing to any creature which begins its turn inside the Aura. This gesture requires 2 Hands to cast, has a base cost of 5 Action and 1 Focus, and must be Maintained costing an additional 1 Focus every subsequent round.

Playtest Notes

This talent is currently placed at a Tier 4 node. It will eventually only be attainable at a higher level (probably Level 6 required). It is currently available "early" for testing.

Emanation templates which are linked to the Token and move when the Token moves are a feature coming in Foundry VTT version 14. Automation of the Aura gesture will occur once Crucible depends on Foundry VTT version 14.

Gesture: Blast.name: Gesture: Blast
Gesture: Blast.description:
You hurl the arcane power of a Rune into an intense explosion of energy at a nearby point you can see.

The Blast gesture scales with Intellect and produces a blast with 6 feet radius centered on a point within 60 feet of the spellcaster. The blast deals 8 Base Damage to targets which fail to Resist the spell. This gesture requires 2 Hands to cast and has a base cost of 5 Action and 2 Focus.

Playtest Notes

This talent is currently placed at a Tier 4 node. It will eventually only be attainable at a higher level (probably Level 6 required). It is currently available "early" for testing.

Gesture: Cone.name: Gesture: Cone
Gesture: Cone.description:
You focus the arcane power of a Rune into a narrow cone that projects outwards from your location.

The Cone gesture scales with Intellect and produces a 60 degree cone with a 30 foot radius originating from the spellcaster. The Cone deals 8 Base Damage to targets which fail to Resist the spell. This gesture requires 2 Hands to cast and has a base cost of 5 Action and 2 Focus.

Playtest Notes

This talent is currently placed at a Tier 4 node. It will eventually only be attainable at a higher level (probably Level 6 required). It is currently available "early" for testing.

Gesture: Conjure.name: Gesture: Conjure
Gesture: Conjure.description:
You coalesce arcane power into a superior form, manifesting a Visitor which appears within 30 feet and joins Combat at Initiative 1. Your Visitor is a Minion equal to your own Level.

The Conjure gesture scales with Wisdom and the Visitor survives for 12 Rounds. You may only have one active Visitor. Casting another spell using the Conjure gesture replaces your previous Visitor. This gesture requires 2 Hands to cast and has a base cost of 5 Action and 2 Focus.

Playtest Notes

This talent is currently placed at a Tier 4 node. It will eventually only be attainable at a higher level (probably Level 6 required). It is currently available "early" for testing.

Not all Runes have a Visitor actor defined yet. Runes that do not yet have a defined Conjuration will — for now — manifest a Flame Visitor.

Gesture: Create.name: Gesture: Create
Gesture: Create.description:
You coalesce arcane power into tangible form, manifesting a Sprite which appears within 10 feet and joins Combat at Initiative 1. Your Sprite is a Minion of half your own Level.

The Create gesture scales with Wisdom and the Sprite survives for 6 Rounds. You may only have one active Sprite, casting another spell using the Create gesture replaces your previous Sprite. This gesture requires 2 Hands to cast and has a base cost of 4 Action and 1 Focus.

Playtest Notes

Not all Runes have a Sprite actor defined yet. Runes that do not yet have a defined Creation will — for now — manifest a Flame Sprite.

Gesture: Fan.name: Gesture: Fan
Gesture: Fan.description:
You shape the essence of a Rune into a sweeping or splintered arc to strike multiple targets in close proximity.

The Fan gesture scales using Intellect and targets a 120 degree arc with 6 foot radius. It deals 6 Base Damage to targets which fail to Resist the spell. This gesture requires 1 Hand to cast and has a base cost of 3 Action and 1 Focus.

Gesture: Influence.name: Gesture: Influence
Gesture: Influence.description:
You intensify the arcane power of a Rune into a concentrated direct contact which is generally a more powerful evolution of the basic Touch gesture.

The Influence gesture scales using Presence and targets a single adjacent creature. It deals 10 Base Damage to targets which fail to Resist the spell. This gesture requires 1 Hand to cast and has a base cost of 3 Action and 1 Focus.

Gesture: Pulse.name: Gesture: Pulse
Gesture: Pulse.description:
Expel the arcane power of a Rune in a radius that travels outward with you at its center.

The Pulse gesture scales using Presence and produces an emanation with 10 foot radius, dealing 8 Base Damage to targets which fail to Resist the spell. The gesture requires 2 Hands to cast and has a base cost of 5 Action and 2 Focus.

Playtest Notes

This talent is currently placed at a Tier 4 node. It will eventually only be attainable at a higher level (probably Level 6 required). It is currently available "early" for testing.

Gesture: Ray.name: Gesture: Ray
Gesture: Ray.description:
You funnel the arcane power of a Rune into a point and project it outwards in a beam.

The Ray gesture scales using Wisdom and produces a line that is 1 foot wide and 30 feet long originating from the spellcaster, dealing 6 Base Damage to targets which fail to Resist the spell. The gesture requires 1 Hand to cast and has a base cost of 4 Action and 1 Focus.

Gesture: Sense.name: Gesture: Sense
Gesture: Sense.description:
You attune your mind to the arcane power of a Rune to sense nearby sources of energy.

The Sense gesture scales with Presence and produces an emanation with 30 feet radius and position that remains centered upon the spellcaster. This gesture requires 1 Hand to cast and has a base cost of 3 Action and 1 Focus. It may optionally be Maintained at the additional cost of 1 Focus every subsequent round.

This spell allows the caster to detect the presence of spellcraft using the same Rune as the one incorporated in this spell. The sense will also momentarily detect the presence of creatures according to their type.

  • Control: Fiends

  • Death: Undead

  • Earth: Oozes and Earth Elementals

  • Flame: Dragons and Fire Elementals

  • Frost: Giants and Frost Elementals

  • Illumination: Celestials

  • Illusion: Fey

  • Kinesis: Monstrosities

  • Life: Plants and Beasts

  • Lightning: Constructs and Storm Elementals

  • Oblivion: Outsiders

  • Soul: Humanoids

Playtest Notes

There is no automation for the sense that is temporarily granted by this spell, but such automation can be provided in the future via a Detection Mode which temporarily reveals creatures of the appropriate type to the spellcaster while the spell is maintained.

Gesture: Step.name: Gesture: Step
Gesture: Step.description:
You infuse runic power into a movement, crossing physical and spatial boundaries.

The Step gesture scales with Dexterity and allows you to move up to 20 feet in a straight line with width equal to your Size. It deals 2 Base Damage to targets along that line which fail to Resist the spell. This gesture does not require any free hands to cast and has a base cost of 3 Action and 1 Focus.

Playtest Notes

The movement aspect of this talent is not yet automated and must be manually performed as a consequence of the spell.

Gesture: Strike.name: Gesture: Strike
Gesture: Strike.description:
You empower a direct close-range attack with the arcane essence of a Rune, performing a Strike with your equipped weapon.

The Strike gesture scales using Strength and deal damage based on your used weapon but with the damage type of the incorporated Rune. This gesture does not require any free hand and has a base cost of 1 Focus in addition to the cost of your weapon Strike.

Gesture: Surge.name: Gesture: Surge
Gesture: Surge.description:
You channel the arcane power of a Rune into a rushing wave of energy that surges forward from your current position.

The Surge gesture scales with Wisdom and produces a line that is 10 feet wide and 15 feet long originating from the spellcaster, dealing 8 Base Damage to targets which fail to Resist the spell. The gesture requires 2 Hands to cast and has a base cost of 5 Action and 2 Focus.

Playtest Notes

This talent is currently placed at a Tier 4 node. It will eventually only be attainable at a higher level (probably Level 6 required). It is currently available "early" for testing.

Gesture: Ward.name: Gesture: Ward
Gesture: Ward.description:
You shape the arcane power of a Rune into a protective barrier used to shield yourself from harm.

The Ward gesture scales using Toughness and provides +6 Resistance against the damage type of the Rune used in the spell. This resistance lasts for 1 Round and you may only have a single Ward at a time. Casting another spell using the Ward gesture replaces your prior Ward. This gesture requires 1 Hand to cast and has a base cost of 2 Action and 1 Focus.

Gladiator.name: Gladiator
Gladiator.description: Once per Round, you can make a Reaction which incorporates a Strike attack without spending any Focus.

Hamstring.name: Hamstring
Hamstring.description: You use a slashing weapon to target the legs of an enemy and cripple their movement.

hamstring.name: Hamstring
hamstring.description: You make Strike attack which is Difficult, but if successful, inflicts the Slowed condition for 3 Rounds.

Healer.name: Healer
Healer.description: You are unparalleled at manipulating vital arcana to treat injuries. You learn Rune: Life if you do not already know it. When healing allies using the Rune of Life you gain +2 Boons to your roll.

fontOfLife.name: Font of Life
fontOfLife.description:
You bring forth an aura of life-giving magic. Immediately upon activation and at the start of your turn for 3 Rounds every ally within 20 feet heals for an amount equal to your Wisdom score.

WIP: This action is currently treated as an Area of Effect, granting healing-over-time effects to those within the initial range. When auras are automated by the system in Foundry VTT version 14, the mechanical implementation of this action will match the description.

Heavy Weapon Proficiency.name: Heavy Weapon Proficiency
Heavy Weapon Proficiency.description: You have a fluent education in the use of martial weaponry. You gain the Journeyman training rank and a +1 Skill Bonus with weapons in the Simple, Heavy, and Balanced categories.

Heavy Weapon Training.name: Heavy Weapon Training
Heavy Weapon Training.description: You know how to use a heavy weapon to deliver punishing blows, putting your entire strength behind every swing. You are Trained with all weapons in the Heavy and Balanced categories.

heavyStrike.name: Heavy Strike
heavyStrike.description: You unleash a powerful Strike with your mainhand weapon. The attack is slower to execute, but is Empowered to deliver additional damage.

Hold Fast.name: Hold Fast
Hold Fast.description: You are a calm anchor in the swirling sea of combat. When you have a Shield equipped, your Engagement increases by +1, allowing you to simultaneously engage more adjacent foes.

Illumination Proficiency.name: Illumination Proficiency
Illumination Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Illumination. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Reveal action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Illusion Proficiency.name: Illusion Proficiency
Illusion Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Illusion. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Seeming action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Impetus.name: Impetus
Impetus.description: You are gifted at exploiting the slowness with which others think. If you are first in Initiative order during a round of Combat, you gain +1 current and maximum Action.

Inexorable Flame.name: Inexorable Flame
Inexorable Flame.description: You recognize that fire can spread with inevitable and unstoppable purpose. Your usage of the Rune of Flame scales with Wisdom instead of Intellect.

Inflection: Compose.name: Inflection: Compose
Inflection: Compose.description: Enhance a spell by taking extra time in its formation, reducing other resource costs in exchange. The Compose inflection reduces the Focus cost of a spell by 1 while increasing its Action cost by 1 in exchange.

Inflection: Determine.name: Inflection: Determine
Inflection: Determine.description: Enhance a spell to make it more difficult to counter. Any attempt to Counter-Spell this spell is made with +2 Banes.

Inflection: Elude.name: Inflection: Elude
Inflection: Elude.description: Enhance a spell to make it more difficult for an enemy to retaliate against its casting. This spell does not provide any opportunity to make reactions that involve Strike attacks, regardless of the results of the spell.

Inflection: Extend.name: Inflection: Extend
Inflection: Extend.description:
Enhance the duration of a spell, increasing the duration of its effect. For spells which are instantaneous, any corresponding status conditions that they cause are increased in duration.

Effect duration increases from the Extend inflection are not yet automated in Playtest 1. This inflection is included as an example of the intended direction for the Spellcraft system.

Inflection: Negate.name: Inflection: Negate
Inflection: Negate.description:
Invert the effect of a spell. An Inverted Life Touch spell which normally heals a target deals Poison damage instead. An Inverted Death Ward spell inflicts vulnerability to Corruption damage upon an adjacent enemy.

The effects of the Negate inflection are not yet automated for Playtest 1. This inflection is included as an example of the intended direction for the Spellcraft system.

Inflection: Pull.name: Inflection: Pull
Inflection: Pull.description: Empower a spell to attract affected creatures toward the caster. Creatures affected by a spell with the Pull inflection move 1 space closer towards the spellcaster if that destination space is unoccupied.

Inflection: Push.name: Inflection: Push
Inflection: Push.description: Empower a spell to repel affected creatures away from the caster. Creatures affected by a spell with the Push inflection move 1 space away from the spellcaster if that destination space is unoccupied.

Inflection: Quicken.name: Inflection: Quicken
Inflection: Quicken.description: Enhance a spell by hastening the speed with which it can be cast, at the expense of increased Focus. The Quicken inflection reduces the Action cost of a spell by 1 while increasing its Focus cost by 1 in exchange.

Inflection: React.name: Inflection: React
Inflection: React.description: Instinctually compose a spell as a Reaction in response to some other action that you observe. The React inflection increases the Focus cost of a spell by 2.

Inflection: Reshape.name: Inflection: Reshape
Inflection: Reshape.description:
Enhance a Spell by carefully reshaping and controlling its area of effect at the cost of 2 Focus.

Offensive spells which use a template target only target enemies within the area. Healing spells which use a template target only target allies within the area.

Single target spells do not incur any Banes due to intervening creatures.

Inquisitor.name: Inquisitor
Inquisitor.description: You are an expert in combat against magic users. You know how to conserve energy and strike at the precise moment to thwart their incantation.

inquisitorsStrike.name: Inquisitor's Strike
inquisitorsStrike.description: When an enemy within your Engagement radius whom you can see casts a spell, you may react to Strike that target. On a Critical Hit the target's spell is interrupted and the magic is lost.
inquisitorsStrike.condition: Your target is casting a spell.

Inspirator.name: Inspirator
Inspirator.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Soul. Spells which use this Rune cause the @Condition[inspired] condition on Critical Hits.

The Inspired effect lasts for 1 Round and deals your Presence score as additional Restoration to Morale.

Inspire Heroism.name: Inspire Heroism
Inspire Heroism.description: Your courageous presence inspires your nearby allies to strike with confidence.

inspireHeroism.name: Inspire Heroism
inspireHeroism.description: Each ally, excluding yourself, within 10 Feet gains +1 Boon to actions performed until the end of their next Turn.

Intellectual Superiority.name: Intellectual Superiority
Intellectual Superiority.description: It is sometimes a marvel how slowly others around you think. You gain +1 Boon on any Strike or Spell attack against an enemy lower than you in Initiative order.

Intercept.name: Intercept
Intercept.description: You protect your allies, intercepting blows that might otherwise be directed towards your companions.

intercept.name: Intercept
intercept.description:
You intercept the path of an enemy which enters your Engagement radius, immediatly moving up to your Stride to interpose yourself and block their path.

If the enemy moves out of your Engagement radius or attacks any other creature during their turn, you may make a Disengagement Strike against them.
intercept.condition: An enemy moves into or through your Engagement radius.

Interrupting Throw.name: Interrupting Throw
Interrupting Throw.description: You are alert and prepared to use your equipped weapon to interrupt enemy spellcraft.

interruptingThrow.name: Interrupting Throw
interruptingThrow.description: When an enemy that you can see casts a Spell which costs 3 Action or greater, you can make a Reaction to perform a Thrown weapon attack against the caster. If your attack results in a Critical Hit the spell is interrupted and its magic is lost.
interruptingThrow.condition: An enemy you can see casts a Spell which costs 3 Action or greater.

Intimidation Adept.name: Intimidation Adept
Intimidation Adept.description: You gain the Adept rank in the Intimidation skill, providing a +2 Skill Bonus.

Intimidation Journeyman.name: Intimidation Journeyman
Intimidation Journeyman.description: You gain the Journeyman rank in the Intimidation skill, providing a +1 Skill Bonus.

Intimidation Master.name: Intimidation Master
Intimidation Master.description: You gain the Master rank in the Intimidation skill, providing a +3 Skill Bonus.

Intimidation Novice.name: Intimidation Novice
Intimidation Novice.description:
You understand the fundamentals of how threats and coercion can achieve desired outcomes. You gain the Novice rank in the Intimidation skill and are no longer considered Untrained in that skill.

You know how to use simple displays of violence or overt threats to get others to follow your lead, but you aren't very subtle.

Intimidator.name: Intimidator
Intimidator.description: You specialize in exerting your intimidating presence to break the morale of your foes.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: You physically intimidate an enemy that is within your engagement range, performing an Intimidation skill attack against your target. On a success they sustain Void damage to Morale.

Intuit Weakness.name: Intuit Weakness
Intuit Weakness.description:
You calm your mind and study the physiology of your foe, seeking a vulnerability in its defenses.

Perform a Knowledge Test using an appropriate Skill chosen by the Gamemaster. On a success, you learn the Damage type that the creature has the greatest vulnerability towards, if any. On a Critical Success you learn the two Damage types which have the largest vulnerability.

intuitWeakness.name: Intuit Weakness
intuitWeakness.description: You still your mind and study the physiology of your foe, attempting to identify a vulnerability in its defenses.

Iramancer.name: Iramancer
Iramancer.description: Your feats of arcana are fueled by anger. While Enraged you may still spend Focus and you deal 2 additional damage to all spell attacks.

Irrepressible Spirit.name: Irrepressible Spirit
Irrepressible Spirit.description: Your tenacity gives you an irrepressible spirit which resists the onset of despair. At the start of your turn if you are not Broken you gain 1 Morale.

Jewelcraft Journeyman.name: Jewelcraft Journeyman
Jewelcraft Journeyman.description:
You have a professional degree of experience with the art of Jewelcrafting and can work with some of the more advanced cuts and designs given time.

The basic properties of most common gems and ornate metals are easy for you to remember without reference material, but you still need books to handle rare schematics and components properly.

Jewelcraft Novice.name: Jewelcraft Novice
Jewelcraft Novice.description:
You have received training in the fundamentals of Jewelcrafting and are capable of working with most common settings and designs.

You still need to reference schematics and books to identify gem stones, ornate metals, and their properties.

Justiciar.name: Justiciar
Justiciar.description: You are an instrument of justice. Critical Strike attacks also deal the Overflow portion of damage to enemy Morale.

Kinesis Proficiency.name: Kinesis Proficiency
Kinesis Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Kinesis. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Propel action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Kineturge.name: Kineturge
Kineturge.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Kinesis. Spells which use this Rune cause the @Condition[bleeding] condition on Critical Hits.

The Bleeding effect lasts for 1 Round and deals your Presence ability score as additional Piercing damage to Health.

Last Stand.name: Last Stand
Last Stand.description: You can muster the toughness and courage to fight on and stand your ground against improbable odds.

lastStand.name: Last Stand
lastStand.description: You expend Heroism to instantly recover two times your Toughness in Health. Your Healing Threshold is reduced by 2 for the next 3 Rounds.

Leg Sweep.name: Leg Sweep
Leg Sweep.description: You use a weapon which scales using Strength to sweep your enemy off balance, swinging low to knock them from their feet.

legSweep.name: Leg Sweep
legSweep.description: You make a Strike attack with your mainhand weapon. This technique is Difficult to execute and deals reduced damage, but if successful renders your target Prone.

Legerdemain.name: Legerdemain
Legerdemain.description: You can silently alter your spellcraft. You can apply Lesser Inflections using only your hands without the need for vocalization.

Lesser Regeneration.name: Lesser Regeneration
Lesser Regeneration.description: Your prodigious hardiness conveys a supernatural capability to recover from wounds quickly. At the start of your turn if you are not Weakened you gain +1 Health.

Life Proficiency.name: Life Proficiency
Life Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Life. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Blossom action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Light Weapon Proficiency.name: Light Weapon Proficiency
Light Weapon Proficiency.description: You have a fluent education in the use of martial weaponry. You gain the Journeyman training rank and a +1 Skill Bonus with weapons in the Light and Balanced categories.

Light Weapon Training.name: Light Weapon Training
Light Weapon Training.description: You know how to wield light weapons fluidly with a high degree of maneuverability and grace in combat. You are Trained with all weapons in the Light and Balanced categories.

lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.description:
You dart forward nimbly, making a strike with sudden and unexpected swiftness to perform a Strike with a Finesse weapon against a single target with an increased range of +2 feet.

The attack is Difficult, but you do not move from your current position nor does this attack provoke Disengagement.

Lightbringer.name: Lightbringer
Lightbringer.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Illumination. Spells which use this Rune cause the @Condition[irradiated] condition on Critical Hits.

The Irradiated effect lasts for 1 Round and deals your Presence score as Radiant damage to both Health and Morale.

Lightning Proficiency.name: Lightning Proficiency
Lightning Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Lightning. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Energize action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Mark Prey.name: Mark Prey
Mark Prey.description: You fire a special shot which deals no damage, but explodes in luminous powder clearly marking your target.

markPrey.name: Mark Prey
markPrey.description: You Strike using a special shot. If your attack is successful the target is Exposed for the next 3 Turns.

Martial Artist.name: Martial Artist
Martial Artist.description: You have honed your body into a dangerous weapon. Your bare fists are treated as weapons of Fine quality, increasing their damage by +1.

Mechanical Weapon Proficiency.name: Mechanical Weapon Proficiency
Mechanical Weapon Proficiency.description: You have a fluent education in the use of crossbows, firearms, and other mechanical weapons. You gain the Journeyman training rank and a +1 Skill Bonus with weapons in the Mechanical category.

Mechanical Weapon Training.name: Mechanical Weapon Training
Mechanical Weapon Training.description: You are familiar in the design and usage of crossbows, firearms, and other similar armaments. You are Trained with weapons in the Mechanical category.

rapidReload.name: Rapid Reload
rapidReload.description: You focus deeply and calm your nerves to quickly Reload your mechanical weapon with exceptional haste.

Medicine Adept.name: Medicine Adept
Medicine Adept.description: You gain the Adept rank in the Medicine skill, providing a +2 Skill Bonus.

Medicine Journeyman.name: Medicine Journeyman
Medicine Journeyman.description: You gain the Journeyman rank in the Medicine skill, providing a +1 Skill Bonus.

Medicine Master.name: Medicine Master
Medicine Master.description: You gain the Master rank in the Medicine skill, providing a +3 Skill Bonus.

Medicine Novice.name: Medicine Novice
Medicine Novice.description:
You have a basic education in anatomy, physiology, and medicine. You gain the Novice rank in the Medicine skill and are no longer considered Untrained in that skill.

You’ve learned the basics of treating common wounds and illnesses, and keep a running list of known alchemical and herbal compounds that can be used for treating particular illnesses. With a little time studying an injured, diseased, or otherwise ill individual you can perform a basic diagnosis and treat accordingly.

Mender.name: Mender
Mender.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Life. Spells which use this Rune cause the @Condition[mending] condition on Critical Hits.

The Mending effect lasts for 1 Round and deals your Wisdom score as additional Restoration to Health.

Mental Fortress.name: Mental Fortress
Mental Fortress.description: Your strong will makes you exceedingly difficult to influence. You gain +1 to your Willpower defense and +5 resistance to Psychic damage.

Mesmer.name: Mesmer
Mesmer.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Illusion. Spells which use this Rune cause @Condition[confused] on Critical Hits.

The Confused effect lasts for 1 Round, deals half your Intellect score as Psychic damage to Morale, and applies the @Condition[disoriented] condition.

Mnemonic Realization.name: Mnemonic Realization
Mnemonic Realization.description:
Your sharpened mind is full of secrets and techniques to remember them. Once per Day you may focus your thoughts and attempt to recall a word that sparks your memory.

The Gamemaster must provide you with a one-word clue that is appropriate for your direction of inquiry. It is left to Gamemaster discretion how direct or vague to be with the clue they provide.

mnemonicRealization.name: Mnemonic Realization
mnemonicRealization.description: You survey your memories attempting to recall a clue for your current situation.

Monk.name: Monk
Monk.description:
You balance monastic discipline with expertise in martial arts, balancing attack and defense in harmony.

While Unarmored, you gain a +2 bonus to your Reflex and Willpower defenses.

While Unarmed you can use the Double Punch action.

doublePunch.name: Double Punch
doublePunch.description: You Strike twice in the blink of an eye, punching with both arms.

Natural Weapon Proficiency.name: Natural Weapon Proficiency
Natural Weapon Proficiency.description: You have a fluent familiarity with the use of natural bodily weapons. You gain the Journeyman training rank and a +1 Skill Bonus with weapons in the Natural category.

Natural Weapon Training.name: Natural Weapon Training
Natural Weapon Training.description: You have a developed familiarity with using features of your own body as a natural weapons including claws, jaws, tails, or other mechanisms of self-defense. You are Trained with weapons in the Natural category.

wildStrike.name: Wild Strike
wildStrike.description: Immediately after you perform a basic Strike, you perform a reduced-cost follow-up Strike against the same target using a different Natural weapon that you have access to.

Necromancer.name: Necromancer
Necromancer.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Death. Spells which use this Rune cause the @Condition[decaying] condition on Critical Hits.

The Decaying effect lasts for 3 Rounds and deals your Intellect score as Corruption damage to Health each Round.

Nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
Nosferatu.description:
You are afflicted with a rare blood mutation which allows your wounds to rapidly heal through hematophagy.

You can restore your Health by biting a living target. This attack is made with a Superior Natural weapon which scales using Strength and deals Piercing damage.

Your vulnerability to Radiant damage increases by 10.

vampiricBite.name: Vampiric Bite
vampiricBite.description: You grasp an enemy and bite it with sharp incisors, rapidly draining its blood to heal your own wounds. This attack requires a free hand to grasp your target while you feed.
vampiricBite.condition: Your target is a living creature.

Oblivion Proficiency.name: Oblivion Proficiency
Oblivion Proficiency.description:
You have fluency in weaving spellcraft using the Rune of Oblivion. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus for spells cast using this Rune.

Playtest Notes

This talent will eventually also provide an upgrade to the Erase action, expanding its effectiveness or including new options for how to use it.

Operator.name: Operator
Operator.description:
You have ice in your veins and remain cool under pressure. Your physical toughness and mental acuity allow you to hone the danger of your situation to achieve the greatest results when the stakes are highest.

While in combat and not Incapacitated, you gain +1 Boon to all checks when you have less than 50% of your maximum Health remaining. You gain +2 Boons to all checks when you have less than 25% of your maximum Health remaining.

Opportunist.name: Opportunist
Opportunist.description: You sieze any opportunity you can to capitalize on an enemy who turns their back on you. You may make a Disengagement Attack even if you are otherwise Fully Engaged, but you do so without the 2 Boons that would ordinarily apply to such an attack.

Opportunistic Spellcraft.name: Opportunistic Spellcraft
Opportunistic Spellcraft.description: Your quick thinking can weave magic to exploit brief windows of opportunity. You may make a Disengagement Attack using the Touch Gesture instead of a melee weapon attack.

Overwatch.name: Overwatch
Overwatch.description: You are an expert in combat against magic users. You know how to conserve energy and strike at the precise moment to thwart their incantation.

disruptingShot.name: Disrupting Shot
disruptingShot.description: When an enemy you can see casts a spell, you may react to Strike that target. The technique is difficult to perform, but on a Critical Hit the target's spell is interrupted and the magic is lost.
disruptingShot.condition: Your target is casting a spell.

Patient Deflection.name: Patient Deflection
Patient Deflection.description: Your expertise with martial arts allows you to dodge or deflect blows as effectively as a heavily armored fighter. While unarmed, half your Wisdom score contributes to your Parry defense.

Penetrating Shot.name: Penetrating Shot
Penetrating Shot.description: You load special ammunition which deals less damage but penetrates directly through a line of targets.

penetratingShot.name: Penetrating Shot
penetratingShot.description: You fire a shot which penetrates through multiple targets in a direct line.

Penetrating Throw.name: Penetrating Throw
Penetrating Throw.description: You can hurl your weapon with such ferocity that it strikes all targets in a direct line.

penetratingThrow.name: Penetrating Throw
penetratingThrow.description: You perform a Throw weapon strike which penetrates to hit all enemies in a straight line.

Performance Adept.name: Performance Adept
Performance Adept.description: You gain the Adept rank in the Performance skill, providing a +2 Skill Bonus.

Performance Journeyman.name: Performance Journeyman
Performance Journeyman.description: You gain the Journeyman rank in the Performance skill, providing a +1 Skill Bonus.

Performance Master.name: Performance Master
Performance Master.description: You gain the Master rank in the Performance skill, providing a +3 Skill Bonus.

Performance Novice.name: Performance Novice
Performance Novice.description:
You have learned the basic practices of art and entertainment. You gain the Novice rank in the Performance skill and are no longer considered Untrained in that skill.

You know a few common dances, have a collection of well-known tales, and you could probably sing or play a few popular songs. You may be trained in an instrument or two, and your capability with a brush or pen is reasonable enough that you could probably create a passable work of art.

Perspicacity.name: Perspicacity
Perspicacity.description: You have heightened insight into aspects of your surroundings. You gain +2 Boons to any Awareness skill test which does not rely upon eyesight.

Pinning Shot.name: Pinning Shot
Pinning Shot.description: You fire a tactically placed shot to pin your target against a nearby surface.

pinningShot.name: Pinning Shot
pinningShot.description: You Strike from distance. The attack is Difficult, however if your target is it it becomes Restrained until the end of their next Turn.

Pistoleer.name: Pistoleer
Pistoleer.description: Your familiarity with mechanical firearms is unmatched. You can perform the Reload action for free once per Round.

salvo.name: Salvo
salvo.description: You fire a barrage of attacks using a one-handed mechanical weapon, shooting three times at a target without the need to reload in-between shots.

Planned Defense.name: Planned Defense
Planned Defense.description: You exert strong battlefield judgment to prepare your defenses against the attacks of your foes. Any enemy which acts after you in Initiative order suffers 1 Bane to their spell or weapon attacks against you.

Poisoner.name: Poisoner
Poisoner.description: You can apply Poison to weapons which deal Slashing or Piercing damage. You deal an additional +2 damage whenever you deal Poison damage and your Strikes cause the Poisoned condition on Critical Strikes which deal damage to Health.

poisonBlades.name: Poison Blades
poisonBlades.description: You nimbly lather your blades in toxic alchemical oils which apply the Poisoned condition on Critical Strikes.

Powerful Physique.name: Powerful Physique
Powerful Physique.description: You can wield weapons with the Slow trait and wear Armor with the Bulky trait without suffering Banes to your Initiative rolls.

Powerful Throw.name: Powerful Throw
Powerful Throw.description: The maximum range at which you can use Throw Weapon is doubled.

Precision Shot.name: Precision Shot
Precision Shot.description: You take time to steady your aim and target the weakest point of a foe. You may only get one shot, but you make it count.

precisionShot.name: Precision Shot
precisionShot.description: You steady your aim and fire a single accurate shot.

Preparedness.name: Preparedness
Preparedness.description: You seem to always be prepared for the moment at hand. You may sacrifice your free movement for the Round to instead equip an Item from your inventory without spending any Action points.

Preternatural Instinct.name: Preternatural Instinct
Preternatural Instinct.description: Your quickness of mind and body are equally impressive. You gain +2 Boons to all Initiative checks.

Projectile Weapon Proficiency.name: Projectile Weapon Proficiency
Projectile Weapon Proficiency.description: You have a fluent education in the use of projectile weaponry. You gain the Journeyman training rank and a +1 Skill Bonus with weapons in the Projectile category.

Projectile Weapon Training.name: Projectile Weapon Training
Projectile Weapon Training.description: You have a basic education in archery and other projectile weaponry. You are no longer treated as Untrained with weapons in the Projectile categories.

quickDraw.name: Quick Draw
quickDraw.description: You can loose a shot under pressure, although with decreased accuracy. You perform a Strike that is Difficult, but has a reduced Action cost.

Provocateur.name: Provocateur
Provocateur.description: You specialize in barbed repartee crafted to highlight your opponent's shortcomings. In combat you can launch quips which provoke your foes.

scathingMockery.name: Scathing Mockery
scathingMockery.description: You exaggerate your opponent's shortcomings with a scathing bon mot, performing a Diplomacy skill attack against your target's Willpower. On a success they suffer modest Psychic damage to Morale and become Enraged for 1 Round.
scathingMockery.condition: Your target can hear and understand you.

Pyromancer.name: Pyromancer
Pyromancer.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Flame. Spells which use this Rune cause @Condition[burning] on Critical Hits.

The Burning effect lasts for 1 Round and deals your Intellect score as Fire damage to both Health and Morale.

Rallying Cry.name: Rallying Cry
Rallying Cry.description: Your presence as a battlefield leader fortifies and restores the morale of your allies.

rallyingCry.name: Rallying Cry
rallyingCry.description: You emit a courageous bellow that inspires allies within 12 feet of you to remain stalwart in the face of peril. All allies within range immediately recover your Presence score in Morale and become @Condition[resolute] for 3 Rounds.

Recognize Spellcraft.name: Recognize Spellcraft
Recognize Spellcraft.description: You can interpret the arcane incantations of others to discern the nature of their spellcraft. When an enemy within 40 feet that you can see and hear begins casting a spell, you can identify its Rune if you also know that Rune.

Repercussive Block.name: Repercussive Block
Repercussive Block.description: You can channel explosive force into a counter-bash which can disarm your opponent when blocking with your shield.

repercussiveBlock.name: Repercussive Block
repercussiveBlock.description: When you Block a Melee attack, you can react to counter-attack with your equipped shield. This technique is Harmless but, if successful, will disarm your opponent forcing their weapon to be Dropped.
repercussiveBlock.condition: You Block a Melee attack with an equipped shield.

Resilient.name: Resilient
Resilient.description:
Your body responds eagerly to healing, demonstrating a remarkable ability to recover from wounds.

Your Wounds Threshold is reduced by 1, making you easier to heal.

Rimecaller.name: Rimecaller
Rimecaller.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Frost. Spells which use this Rune cause the @Condition[freezing] condition on Critical Hits.

The Freezing effect lasts for 1 Round, deals half your Wisdom score as Frost damage to Health, and applies the @Condition[slowed] condition.

Rune: Control.name: Rune: Control
Rune: Control.description:
The orderly force of discipline and permanence. The Control rune governs thought, reason, and persistence.

The Control rune scales using Intellect, targets Willpower, and deals Psychic damage to Morale. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Kinesis.

motivate.name: Motivate
motivate.description:
Your command of the Rune of Control allows you to affect the decision making of others in basic ways, producing one of the following effects:

  • Moderately intensify or dampen the primary emotion being felt by a creature you touch. If the creature is intelligent enough to be aware of the laws governing spellcraft, they are aware of your actions.

  • Understand the abstract motivations of another living creature which allows you to touch it. You are able to intuit their immediate goals expressed in the form of a single verb.

  • Intensely focus on your current objective and the means of achieving it. You receive a brief hint or reminder from the Gamemaster about that objective containing only information which you have previously learned.

Motivate may only affect a creature or object which you can physically touch. You may attempt other uses similar those above, the effectiveness of which is decided by the Gamemaster.

Rune: Death.name: Rune: Death
Rune: Death.description:
The orderly force of destruction, responsible for the corruption of all biological matter. The Death rune governs decay and destruction.

The Death rune scales using Presence, targets Fortitude, and deals Corruption damage to Health. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Life.

ennervate.name: Ennervate
ennervate.description:
Your command of the Rune of Death allows for basic communion with the dead and for rudimentary manipulation of unholy forces, producing one of the following effects:

  • Spread decay over an object no larger than a 1-foot cube, causing plants to wither, metallic objects to rust, wood to become rotten, food to grow foul, or a corpse to rapidly decompose. Magical objects are typically unaffected.

  • Cause a corpse which has been dead for less than seven days or otherwise preserved to perform a lifeless reenactment of its final moments. Its movements imitate those that occurred during the creature's final 30 seconds of life. You have no control over the creature nor can it communicate in any other way.

  • Hasten the death of a willing creature that is currently dying, causing it to pass swiftly and peacefully.

Ennervate may only affect a creature or object you can physically touch. You may attempt other uses similar those above, the effectiveness of which is decided by the Gamemaster.

Rune: Earth.name: Rune: Earth
Rune: Earth.description:
The orderly force of elemental earth, responsible for physical matter. The Earth rune governs minerals, metals, soils, and other physical compounds.

The Earth rune scales using Wisdom, targets Reflex, and deals Acid damage to Health. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Lightning.

mould.name: Mould
mould.description:
Your command of the Rune of Earth allows you to manipulate raw forces of rock, mineral, and soil in basic ways, producing one of the following effects:

  • Quickly shape up to one cubic foot of available material into a simple geometric form like a cuboid, ellipsoid, or polyhedron.

  • Precisely copy the physical shape of a held object that is smaller than a 6-inch cube, reproducing it from available clay, stone, or metal. The replica retains no useful properties except for its physical form.

  • Separate and collect earthen particles from the surface of an object, creature, or liquid that you touch, rendering the subject completely cleaned or purified in moments.

Mould may only affect a creature or object you can physically touch. You may attempt other uses similar those above, the effectiveness of which is decided by the Gamemaster.

Rune: Flame.name: Rune: Flame
Rune: Flame.description:
The chaotic force of elemental, thermal energy. The Flame rune governs fire and heat.

The Flame rune scales using Intellect, targets Reflex, and deals Fire damage to Health. It is opposed by the orderly rune of Frost.

enkindle.name: Enkindle
enkindle.description:
Your command of the Rune of Flame allows you to manipulate fire and thermal energy in creative ways, producing one of the following effects:

  • Manifest a burst of elemental flame in one inch sphere which can ignite a candle, torch, or other flammable materials.

  • Imbue your body with momentary thermal shielding which provides you with immunity to fire damage on an immediately subsequent action that costs 1 Action or less.

  • Control the movement of flames within a small area, causing them to flicker, dance, or shift in an animated performance of light and shadow.

Enkindle may only affect a creature or object you can physically touch. You may attempt other uses similar those above, the effectiveness of which is decided by the Gamemaster.

Rune: Frost.name: Rune: Frost
Rune: Frost.description:
